title: 5-Min Box Breathing
description: Inhale 4s, hold 4s, exhale 4s, hold 4s â€” repeat for grounding.

title: 2-Min Desk Stretch
description: Neck rolls, shoulder shrugs, and wrist stretches to relieve tension.

title: Pomodoro Mini-Session (25/5)
description: Focus for 25 minutes, then take a 5-minute break. Repeat 4x then take a longer break.

title: 1-Min Mindful Check-in
description: Quick self-rating of mood/stress on a 1-10 scale and one breath to reset.

title: Walk Break - 10 Minutes
description: A short walk outside or around the building to increase circulation and mental clarity.

title: Active Recall Flashcard Burst
description: Spend 15 minutes testing yourself with flashcards on one subtopic.

title: Progressive Muscle Relaxation
description: Tense and relax muscle groups from feet to face to release tension.

title: Eye Break - 20/20/20
description: Every 20 minutes, look at something 20 feet away for 20 seconds to reduce eye strain.

title: Interleaved Practice Session
description: Mix problems from 2-3 related topics instead of doing one repetitively.

title: 1-Min Gratitude Pause
description: Write down one thing that went well in your study session to boost morale.
